summary: Tara Woodley is a reporter looking to do a story on the famous ghosts of an old desert town. she can't seem to find the place until she picks up a strange hitchhiker, who tells her he knows... See full summary »
cast: Greg Brown|Garrett Clancy|Michael Coen|Brian C. Donnelly|Matt Emery|John Kyle Grady|Joe Haggerty|Janet Tracy Keijser|Beverly Lynne|Joe Myles|Jarrod Robbins|Emmy Smith
title: The Zombie Chronicles
